docna.cdata!:
Costa Rica - Sixth Power Project : Loan 1713
            - Loan Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Costa Rica - Sixth Power Project
            : Loan 1713 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

docna.cdata!:
Costa Rica - Sixth Power Project : Loan 1713
            - Guarantee Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Costa Rica - Sixth Power Project
            : Loan 1713 - Guarantee Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the project are to
            meet part of the anticipated demand for greater, more
            reliable electricity supply throughout Costa Rica by
            extending the transmission and distribution network, and to
            help define the power investment program after 1982. It
            consists of the installation of transmission lines,
            substations, subtransmission and distribution works;
            extension of the load dispatching center; engineering
            studies of the Boruca hydroelectric power station; studies
            of non-conventional power stations for isolated locations;
            the provision of construction and laboratory equipment for
            transmission facilities; and training. The project faces no
            special risks.
